progress.title: Your Progress
progress.no_data_desc: Start logging your workouts to see your progress here. Statistics and charts will appear automatically.
progress.select_exercise: Select an exercise to see detailed progress charts.
progress.no_chart_data: Not enough data to display the chart.

data.title: Data and Backups
data.description: Export your data to create a backup or transfer it to another device. You can also import previously exported data.
data.export_desc: Export all your training data, logs, and settings to create a backup or transfer them to another device.
data.import_desc: Import your training data, logs, and settings from a backup file.
data.import_error: Error processing the file. Make sure it's a valid JSON file.

sync.title: Cloud Sync
sync.description: Sync your data with the cloud to access it from any device.

theme.title: App Theme
theme.description: Dark theme reduces eye strain in low-light environments and saves battery on OLED screen devices.

phase.title: Training Phase
phase.description: Change the current phase of your training plan. This will affect the routines shown in the plan.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure notifications to remind you of your workouts.

about.title: About the app
about.description: An app for tracking workouts and progress in the gym.

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of the app.

sync.description: Sync your data with the cloud to access it from any device.
sync.newer_data_available: Newer data available in the cloud.
sync.sync_error: Error syncing data. Please try again.

auth.name: Name
auth.reset_instructions: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.reset_email_sent: An email with instructions to reset your password has been sent.
